events.title: Chatbot Workshop for School Students
events.description: A hands-on workshop introducing school students to chatbot development. Participants learned to build simple chatbots and explored the basics of conversational AI.

detailPage.overview: This workshop introduced school students to the world of chatbots and conversational AI. Through interactive sessions and hands-on activities, participants learned how chatbots work, built their own simple bots, and explored real-world applications in education and business.
highlights: Building a basic chatbot from scratch
Live demo and Q&A with AI experts

events.title: OpenAI API Workshop for Plaksha Students
events.description: A workshop on the basics of working with the OpenAI API, followed by a competition. Teams built GPT-powered games and the best game won cash prizes.

detailPage.overview: A deep dive into the OpenAI API for Plaksha students. The event included a technical walkthrough, hands-on coding, and a game development competition using GPT models. Winners received cash prizes and certificates.

events.title: Streamlit Computer Vision Workshop
events.description: A practical workshop on building computer vision models and deploying them with Streamlit and Roboflow. Participants created their own object detection apps.

detailPage.overview: Participants learned to build and deploy computer vision models using Streamlit and Roboflow. The workshop covered data collection, model training, and app deployment, culminating in a showcase of student-built object detection apps.

events.title: Prompt Engineering Workshop
events.description: Dive into the art and science of prompt engineering. Learn how to craft effective prompts for large language models and improve your AI project outcomes.

detailPage.overview: This hands-on session focused on prompt engineering for large language models. Attendees learned how to design effective prompts, experiment with different strategies, and optimize outputs for real-world applications.

events.title: AI for Social Good
events.description: Discover how artificial intelligence is being used to address social challenges. Hear from experts and participate in hands-on activities to learn more about AI for good.

detailPage.overview: A showcase of how AI is being used to address social and environmental challenges. The event featured expert talks, project demos, and a collaborative ideation session for new AI4Good initiatives.
highlights: Talks by AI for Good leaders

events.title: Panel: Data Science in Climate Action
events.description: Exploring how women are leading the charge in using Big Data to solve environmental challenges. Featuring guest speakers from UN Women in Tech.

detailPage.overview: A panel discussion on the role of data science in climate action, featuring women leaders from academia, industry, and NGOs. The session included case studies, open Q&A, and networking opportunities.
highlights: Panel with UN Women in Tech
